meta.pricing_note: Pre-configured combos are one-time purchase. Per-use execution fees apply on 0nmcp.com.

pro.label: Pro
pro.applies_to: 2-service capabilities with AI processing or complex logic

capabilities.name: Form Submission to CRM Lead
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, automatically create a new lead in your CRM with all form data mapped to contact fields.
capabilities.example_action: Create CRM contact with name, email, phone, and custom fields

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Welcome Email
capabilities.description: When a Google Form is submitted, automatically send a personalized welcome email via Gmail.

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, instantly notify your team in a Slack channel with the response details.
capabilities.example_action: Post formatted message to #leads Slack channel

capabilities.name: Form Submission to HubSpot Deal
capabilities.description: When a JotForm is submitted, create a new deal in HubSpot with contact details and deal value.
capabilities.example_action: Create HubSpot deal with contact association

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Meeting Booking
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, send the respondent a Calendly scheduling link via email.

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Email List
capabilities.description: When a Google Form is submitted, add the respondent to a Mailchimp email list with tags.
capabilities.example_action: Add subscriber to Mailchimp list with tags

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Invoice
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, automatically create and send a Stripe invoice to the respondent.
capabilities.example_action: Create and send Stripe invoice for selected service

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Trello Card
capabilities.description: When a JotForm is submitted, create a Trello card with all submission details in the right list.
capabilities.example_action: Create Trello card in 'New Requests' list

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Asana Task
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, create an Asana task assigned to the right team member.
capabilities.example_action: Create Asana task in project with assignee

capabilities.name: Form Submission to SMS Confirmation
capabilities.description: When a Google Form is submitted, send an SMS confirmation to the respondent's phone number.
capabilities.dot_0n_config: { "trigger": "google_forms.response_submitted", "action": "twilio.sms_send", "map": { "to": "{{response.phone}}", "body": "We received your submission. We'll be in touch!" } }

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Spreadsheet Row
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, add all response data as a new row in Google Sheets.
capabilities.example_action: Append row to Google Sheet with all fields

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Notion Page
capabilities.description: When a JotForm is submitted, create a Notion database entry with all submission data.
capabilities.example_action: Create Notion database item with mapped fields

capabilities.name: Form Submission to WhatsApp Message
capabilities.description: When a Typeform is submitted, send a WhatsApp confirmation message to the respondent.
capabilities.example_action: Send WhatsApp template message to respondent

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Salesforce Lead
capabilities.description: When a Google Form is submitted, create a Salesforce lead with all form field data.

capabilities.name: Form Submission to Pipedrive Deal
capabilities.description: When a JotForm is submitted, create a Pipedrive deal with contact and deal value.

capabilities.name: New CRM Lead to Welcome Email
capabilities.description: When a new lead is created in your CRM, send a personalized welcome email via Gmail.

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to Invoice
capabilities.description: When a deal is marked as won in your CRM, automatically create and send a Stripe invoice.
capabilities.example_action: Create Stripe customer and send invoice

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When a deal is closed in your CRM, celebrate with a Slack notification to the team.

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: When a deal closes, log it to a Google Sheet for tracking and reporting.
capabilities.example_action: Append deal data as new row

capabilities.name: New Lead to SMS Notification
capabilities.description: When a new lead enters your CRM, send an SMS alert to your sales team.

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to QuickBooks Invoice
capabilities.description: When a deal is won, create a QuickBooks invoice automatically for accounting.

capabilities.name: New Contact to Mailchimp List
capabilities.description: When a new contact is added to CRM, add them to a Mailchimp email list.
capabilities.example_action: Add to Mailchimp list with tags

capabilities.name: Lead Status Change to Notion Update
capabilities.description: When a lead status changes in CRM, update the corresponding Notion database entry.

capabilities.name: Deal Won to WhatsApp Confirmation
capabilities.description: When a deal is won, send a WhatsApp confirmation to the client.

capabilities.name: CRM Contact to HubSpot Sync
capabilities.description: When a contact is updated in 0nMCP CRM, sync the changes to HubSpot.

capabilities.name: Lead Assigned to Trello Card
capabilities.description: When a lead is assigned in CRM, create a Trello card for follow-up tracking.
capabilities.example_action: Create Trello card in 'Follow Up' list

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to DocuSign Contract
capabilities.description: When a deal closes, automatically send a DocuSign contract for signature.

capabilities.name: New Lead to Discord Alert
capabilities.description: When a new lead enters CRM, post an alert to your Discord server.

capabilities.name: Lead Score Change to Salesforce Update
capabilities.description: When a lead score changes in 0nMCP CRM, sync the update to Salesforce.

capabilities.name: Deal Closed to LinkedIn Post
capabilities.description: When a deal closes, share a win announcement on your LinkedIn company page.

capabilities.name: Stripe Payment to Gmail Receipt
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment is received, send a receipt email via Gmail.

capabilities.name: Stripe Payment to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: When a payment is received, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Stripe Payment to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: When a payment is received, log it to Google Sheets for tracking.

capabilities.name: Stripe Payment to QuickBooks Entry
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment is received, create a QuickBooks income entry.

capabilities.name: Shopify Order to Stripe Invoice
capabilities.description: When a Shopify order is placed, create a Stripe invoice for B2B billing.

capabilities.name: Shopify Order Shipped to SMS
capabilities.description: When a Shopify order ships, send an SMS notification to the customer.

capabilities.name: Shopify Order to WhatsApp Update
capabilities.description: When a Shopify order ships, send a WhatsApp update to the customer.

capabilities.name: Failed Payment to Dunning Email
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment fails, send a dunning email via SendGrid.

capabilities.name: New Subscription to CRM Contact
capabilities.description: When a Stripe subscription is created, add the customer to your CRM.

capabilities.name: Square Payment to Xero Entry
capabilities.description: When a Square payment is processed, log it in Xero accounting.

capabilities.name: FreshBooks Invoice Paid to Slack
capabilities.description: When a FreshBooks invoice is paid, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Stripe Payment to Airtable Record
capabilities.description: When a Stripe payment is received, create an Airtable record for tracking.

capabilities.name: Email Open to CRM Lead Score
capabilities.description: When someone opens a Mailchimp email, update their lead score in CRM.

capabilities.name: Email Click to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When someone clicks a link in your email, send a Slack alert.

capabilities.name: Unsubscribe to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: When someone unsubscribes from Mailchimp, log it to Google Sheets.

capabilities.name: Campaign Sent to Notion Log
capabilities.description: When a SendGrid campaign is sent, log it to your Notion content calendar.

capabilities.name: Email Bounce to HubSpot Update
capabilities.description: When a Mailchimp email bounces, update the HubSpot contact record.

capabilities.name: New Subscriber to SMS Welcome
capabilities.description: When a new subscriber joins your Mailchimp list, send a welcome SMS.

capabilities.name: Subscriber Tag to Salesforce Sync
capabilities.description: When subscriber tags change in Mailchimp, sync to Salesforce.

capabilities.name: Blog Post to Facebook
capabilities.description: When a WordPress blog post is published, share it on Facebook.

capabilities.name: New Product to Instagram Post
capabilities.description: When a new Shopify product launches, create an Instagram post.

capabilities.name: Notion Page to LinkedIn Post
capabilities.description: When a Notion page is published, share it as a LinkedIn post.

capabilities.name: GitHub Release to X Post
capabilities.description: When a GitHub release is published, tweet about it on X.

capabilities.name: Canva Design to TikTok
capabilities.description: When a Canva video design is completed, upload to TikTok.

capabilities.name: Shopify Product to Pinterest Pin
capabilities.description: When a new Shopify product is added, create a Pinterest pin.

capabilities.name: Facebook Lead Ad to CRM
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Lead Ad is submitted, create a CRM lead.

capabilities.name: Facebook Lead Ad to Email
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Lead Ad is submitted, send a follow-up email.

capabilities.name: Facebook Lead Ad to Slack
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Lead Ad is submitted, alert your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Facebook Lead Ad to Mailchimp
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Lead Ad is submitted, add the lead to Mailchimp.

capabilities.name: Instagram DM to Zendesk Ticket
capabilities.description: When an Instagram DM is received, create a Zendesk support ticket.

capabilities.name: LinkedIn Connection to CRM
capabilities.description: When a LinkedIn connection is made, add to CRM as a new contact.

capabilities.name: Cross-Post to All Social Platforms
capabilities.description: Post content to Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, Pinterest, and TikTok simultaneously.

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to Google Calendar
capabilities.description: When a Calendly meeting is booked, create a Google Calendar event.

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When a Calendly meeting is booked, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Calendly Booking to CRM Activity
capabilities.description: When a Calendly meeting is booked, create a CRM activity record.

capabilities.name: Zoom Meeting End to Summary Email
capabilities.description: When a Zoom meeting ends, send a summary email to all participants.

capabilities.name: Zoom Meeting End to Follow-Up Task
capabilities.description: When a Zoom meeting ends, create a follow-up Trello card.

capabilities.name: Zoom Meeting to SMS Reminder
capabilities.description: When a Zoom meeting is scheduled, send an SMS reminder to participants.

capabilities.name: Zoom Meeting to Notion Recap
capabilities.description: When a Zoom meeting ends, create a Notion page with meeting recap.

capabilities.name: Calendar Event to WhatsApp Reminder
capabilities.description: When a Google Calendar event is created, send a WhatsApp reminder.

capabilities.name: Zendesk Ticket to Slack
capabilities.description: When a Zendesk ticket is created, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Zendesk Resolved to Survey Email
capabilities.description: When a Zendesk ticket is resolved, send a satisfaction survey email.

capabilities.name: Intercom Chat to CRM Activity
capabilities.description: When an Intercom chat starts, create a CRM activity record.

capabilities.name: Freshdesk Escalation to SMS Alert
capabilities.description: When a Freshdesk ticket is escalated, send an SMS alert to the manager.

capabilities.name: Billing Ticket to Stripe Alert
capabilities.description: When a support ticket mentions billing, pull the customer's Stripe data.

capabilities.name: Ticket Closed to Knowledge Base
capabilities.description: When a ticket is closed, create a Notion knowledge base entry.

capabilities.name: Intercom Chat to Asana Task
capabilities.description: When an Intercom chat ends, create a follow-up Asana task.

capabilities.name: Trello Card Done to Slack
capabilities.description: When a Trello card moves to Done, notify Slack.

capabilities.name: Asana Task Complete to Email
capabilities.description: When an Asana task is completed, send an email update.

capabilities.name: Monday.com Status to Google Sheets
capabilities.description: When a Monday.com status changes, update Google Sheets.

capabilities.name: ClickUp Task Assigned to Discord
capabilities.description: When a ClickUp task is assigned, send a Discord alert.

capabilities.name: Trello Card to Calendar Event
capabilities.description: When a Trello card is created with a due date, create a Google Calendar event.

capabilities.name: Asana Project Complete to Invoice
capabilities.description: When an Asana project is marked complete, create a Stripe invoice.

capabilities.name: Todoist Due Task to SMS Reminder
capabilities.description: When a Todoist task is due, send an SMS reminder.

capabilities.name: Google Task Complete to Notion
capabilities.description: When a Google Task is completed, update a Notion database entry.

capabilities.name: WordPress Post to Social Burst
capabilities.description: When a WordPress post is published, share on all social platforms.

capabilities.name: WordPress Post to Email Campaign
capabilities.description: When a WordPress post is published, notify your Mailchimp email list.

capabilities.name: WordPress Form to CRM Lead
capabilities.description: When a WordPress form is submitted, add the lead to your CRM.

capabilities.name: Webflow Form to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When a Webflow form is submitted, send a Slack alert.

capabilities.name: Wix Order to Stripe Invoice
capabilities.description: When a Wix order is placed, create a Stripe invoice.

capabilities.name: Canva Design to WordPress Post
capabilities.description: When a Canva design is finished, create a WordPress post with the image.

capabilities.name: WordPress Post to Notion Archive
capabilities.description: When a blog post is published, archive it in Notion.

capabilities.name: Google Ads Lead to CRM
capabilities.description: When a Google Ads lead comes in, add to CRM.

capabilities.name: Google Ads Lead to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When a Google Ads lead comes in, alert your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Google Ads Lead to Welcome Email
capabilities.description: When a Google Ads lead comes in, send a welcome email.

capabilities.name: Facebook Ad Lead to CRM
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Ad lead comes in, add to CRM.

capabilities.name: Facebook Ad Lead to Mailchimp
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Ad lead comes in, add to Mailchimp email list.

capabilities.name: Facebook Ad Lead to WhatsApp
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Ad lead comes in, send a WhatsApp message.

capabilities.name: Ad Spend Alert to Slack
capabilities.description: When ad spend exceeds a threshold, send a Slack alert.

capabilities.name: Campaign Report to Google Sheets
capabilities.description: When a Facebook Ads campaign ends, export the report to Google Sheets.

capabilities.name: DocuSign Signed to Stripe Invoice
capabilities.description: When a DocuSign contract is signed, create a Stripe invoice.

capabilities.name: DocuSign Signed to Slack Alert
capabilities.description: When a contract is signed, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: DocuSign Signed to CRM Update
capabilities.description: When a DocuSign contract is signed, update the CRM deal stage.

capabilities.name: DocuSign Signed to Google Drive
capabilities.description: When a contract is signed, save it to Google Drive.

capabilities.name: Dropbox File to Slack Notification
capabilities.description: When a file is added to Dropbox, notify your team in Slack.

capabilities.name: Dropbox Share to Google Sheets Log
capabilities.description: When a Dropbox file is shared, log it to Google Sheets.

capabilities.name: AI-Draft Email from Support Ticket
capabilities.description: When a support ticket comes in, AI drafts a response email.

capabilities.name: AI-Generate Social from Blog
capabilities.description: When a blog post is published, AI generates social posts for every platform.

capabilities.name: AI-Summarize Meeting to Tasks
capabilities.description: When a Zoom meeting ends, AI summarizes it and creates Trello tasks.

capabilities.name: AI-Score Lead from Form
capabilities.description: When a form is submitted, AI scores the lead quality before adding to CRM.

capabilities.name: AI-Write Product Description
capabilities.description: AI generates product descriptions for Shopify listings.

capabilities.name: AI-Generate Invoice from Text
capabilities.description: Describe what to invoice in natural language, AI creates the Stripe invoice.

capabilities.name: AI-Create Design Brief
capabilities.description: When a design task is created in Asana, AI writes a Canva design brief.

capabilities.name: AI-Analyze Customer Sentiment
capabilities.description: AI analyzes customer sentiment from support tickets and alerts Slack.

capabilities.name: AI-Translate WhatsApp Messages
capabilities.description: AI translates incoming WhatsApp messages and sends translated replies.

capabilities.name: AI-Route Support Tickets
capabilities.description: AI auto-tags and routes support conversations to the right CRM pipeline.
